comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Heinrich Oelerich, designer of the German reconnaissance aircraft DWV C.V Captioned [handwritten:] 8150 m. H&oumlhen-Weltrecord Oelerich's, a[m]. 14.7.14, auf D.F.W. Militär-Doppeldecker 1914. (Oelerich's 8150 meter altitude record, on 14 July 1914, on a D.F.W. military biplane, 1914)
